text: Rafael Heredia Estrella (19 February 1937 - 28 January 2021) was a Mexican basketball player. He competed in the 1964 Summer Olympics and in the 1968 Summer Olympics. He was born in Mexico City. Heredia died on 28 January 2021 in Mexico City, aged 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympians for Mexico Category:Mexican basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City
title: Rafael Heredia
